response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item carries immense value to us, and we believe it could bring similar joy and utility to your life or business. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. We hope this opportunity aligns with your needs and budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this exceptional product with you.", "product_price": 750000}
